Description: One pendant and three beads in different shape and materials. A: One poppy seed pendant made of red jasper, the top part is broken off at the perforation, well polished. B: One cylindrical bead made of glazed stone (?) in an orange-brown colour. C: One extended spherical bead made of turquoise glass. D: One small spherical bead made of corroded glass, now whitish pearlescent in colour.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
